$ul: **AccessToken**: Security access token used for accessing the invoice anonymously
**Activities**: List of invoice activities. Invoice audit log
**AdditionalEmails**: Client additional emails contact for CC
**ClientCountryId**: Indicates the country where the clients is from
**ClientCurrencyId**: Indicates the default system currency used by the user for the client
**UiLanguageId**: Hold a value of the language in which the invoice will be sent
**ClonedFromId**: Indicate from which invoice this invoice has been cloned from
**DiscountAmount**: Amount that goes as a discount
**Duedate**: Indicates when the invoice will be proclamed as due
**EnablePartialPayments**: Indicate that the invoice allows the user to pay the invoice partially
**InvoiceCategoryId**: Hold the id of the invoice category
**IssuedOn**: Indicates when the invoice was issued
**PaymentGateways**: List of enabled payment gateways for this invoice
**PoNumber**: Unique number generated by the buyer
**DayOfMonth**: Day of month when the recurrance should happen
**DayOfWeek**: Day when the recurrance should happen
**DueDateInDays**: Total number of days for the client to pay the invoice after issuing it
**EndOfRecurrance**: Indcate the date when the recurrance should stop
**Month**: Month when the recurrance should happen
**StartOfRecurrance**: Indcate the date when the recurrance has started
**RecurringProfileId**: Hold the id of the recurring profile
**ShouldSendReminders**: Should send email reminders to client?
**Status**: Indicate the status of the invoice (paid/unpaid/overdue)
**SubTotalAmount**: Total amount of the invoice without tax
**TaxAmount**: Amount that goes to the tax
**TotalAmount**: Total amount of the invoice with tax
